definition: a weedy trailing mat-forming herb with bright yellow flowers cultivated for its edible mildly acidic leaves, eaten raw or cooked, especially in Indian, Greek and Middle Eastern cuisine
details:
noun
- a weedy trailing mat-forming herb with bright yellow flowers cultivated for its edible mildly acidic leaves, eaten raw or cooked, especially in Indian, Greek and Middle Eastern cuisine
= synonyms: common purslane
